name: Cadre
description: A real estate technology startup co-founded and partly owned by White House senior adviser Jared Kushner. Kushner doesn't play an active role in Cadre's operations, company officials say when asked about the president's son-in-law. But he hasn't divested his Cadre stake

stories.description: A real estate technology startup co-founded and partly owned by White House senior adviser Jared Kushner. Kushner doesn't play an active role in Cadre's operations, company officials say when asked about the president's son-in-law. But he hasn't divested his Cadre stake
stories.headline: Jared Kushner's tech startup seeking at least $100 million from Saudi-backed fund
